sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Chesapeake Energy ( CHK ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 3.9%.
Year to date, Chesapeake Energy registers a 47.0% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 7.5%.
Salesforce.com is lower by about 14.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Acuity Brands ( AYI ), trading down 5.5%, and Constellation Brands ( STZ ), trading up 3.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
